data.name: Skeleton Boomerang - Vampire Hunter Mode
data.detailed_description:
Vampire Hunter Mode is an expansion to Skeleton Boomerang that adds a brand new campaign. Venture through randomly generated stages, collect powerups, battle new enemies and bosses, and attempt to take down a vicious vampire bent on creating an eternal night! But beware, whenever you fail, the night is reset once more.

Chat with characters new and old to help you out on your adventure, or to attempt special quests that test your ability to complete runs with a preset loadout. Complete deadly trials to win blessings, or fail them and be saddled with a terrible hex. Collect shards to buy items, or gamble them for a chance to earn greater rewards. The world and time itself is ever shifting, so there's plenty of unique experiences to be had!

data.short_description: Sucked into an ever shifting landscape, Hunter must battle an evil, bloodthirsty vampire in this new rogue-like campaign!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Graphics: 256 mb
  • Storage: 31 MB available space
